text: small developer quality of life idea - that RTE “advanced” dropdown - replace it with either a `</>` symbol or `Source Code` when viewed from the design manager. Most of the people using the design manager are prepared to live dangerously. The rest understand they’re living dangerously if they tinker in those tools without understanding them.
Hey Jon - I hear you on this. We’ll be thinking through this one. Thanks for bringing it up!
would love if HubDB had a column type for Files (ie: pdfs)
